Class DefaultMover

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.io.util.DefaultMover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataMover

    public class DefaultMover
extends Object
implements DataMover
    Moves files without applying any transformations to the data.
    See Also:

      • importMove

        public void importMove(InputStream hostSource,
              OutputStream virtualTarget)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: DataMover
        Indicates that an import is done. After the data is moved, both streams must be closed by the DataMover implementation.
        Specified by:
        importMove in interface DataMover
        Parameters:
        hostSource - the data source (is on the host system)
        virtualTarget - the data target (is on the virtual disk)
        Throws:
        IOException
